age_range.evidence: Participant stated living in Los Angeles, attending graduate school, and described their lifestyle, aligning with the typical age range for graduate students.

gender.evidence: Participant's language and interests (coding, gaming, photography) align with typical male preferences.

nationality_background.evidence: Participant's location (Los Angeles), educational institution (Northeastern University), and general references all indicate a US background.

location.evidence: Explicitly stated multiple times in the transcript.

living_situation.evidence: Participant directly states they live with a roommate.

occupation.evidence: Participant identifies as a Master's student and works as a part-time AI developer.

education.evidence: Participant explicitly states they are a Master's student.

goals_and_motivations.evidence: Purchase of crocs driven by vacation needs, interest in durable items, and desire to support their research work.

interests.evidence: Participant’s major (computer science), research area (human-computer interaction), hobbies (photography, gaming), and the reason for buying crocs (Hawaii vacation).

values.evidence: Goal-oriented approach to scheduling, preference for high-quality products, focus on functional needs (air purifier), and desire for efficient shopping (buying from Asian supermarkets).

frequency_of_use.evidence: Participant frequently purchases items online, including electronics, daily necessities, and occasionally, more expensive items.

where_used_devices.evidence: Participant primarily uses a smartphone and desktop for online shopping and research.

search_style_best_vs_first.evidence: Participant stated they initially search for items, then refine their search based on the results.

price_preference_cheapest_vs_expensive.evidence: Participant actively seeks out the cheapest options, especially when purchasing electronics and daily necessities.

decision_factors.evidence: Participant explicitly states these factors as driving their purchasing decisions.

preferred_categories.evidence: Participant’s purchase history includes electronics, clothing, home goods, and groceries.

pain_points_and_or_challenges.value: Size uncertainty, inaccurate search terms, irrelevant ads
pain_points_and_or_challenges.evidence: Participant’s concerns regarding size discrepancies and frustration with irrelevant ads.
